message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're starting high, I'll meet you in the middle!
I'll meet you halfway, but I want a slightly better deal this time!
You're getting desperate, I'll give you a slightly better deal this time, but I'm not giving up my advantage!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better deal to make it worth my while!
You're getting closer, but I'm not willing to give up too much, I'm a shrewd negotiator!
I'm willing to give you a better deal, but I need something in return, let's make a deal!
You're getting desperate, I'm taking a bigger share, it's now or never!
I'm willing to give you a better deal, but I need something in return, let's make a deal before it's too late!
You're running out of time, I'm taking the majority, you're getting a small share!
I'm making a last-ditch effort, I'll give you a better deal, but this is my final offer!
It's now or never, I'm taking almost all the money, you'll get a tiny share!
